publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7910 Linda Fabiani: South Lanarkshire College—That the Parliament congratulates South Lanarkshire College on its excellent recent HMIE report, which reported that the inspectorate had full confidence in the college as well as noting six examples of excellent practice or sector-leading and innovative practice and not a single main point for action, and praises the students and staff of the college for their work.

S3M-7910 Linda Fabiani: South Lanarkshire College—That the Parliament congratulates South Lanarkshire College on its excellent recent HMIE report, which reported that the inspectorate had full confidence in the college as well as noting six examples of excellent practice or sector-leading and innovative practice and not a single main point for action, and praises the students and staff of the college for their work.
S3M-7910 South Lanarkshire College (lodged on 8 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
